Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: build to suit lease obligations incurred
repayments of long term capital lease obligations
repayments of long term finance lease obligations
right of use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of long term debt and capital securities
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term debt and capital securities
repayments of long term financing obligations
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments for proceeds from productive assets
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: fixed assets acquired under build to suit leases
proceeds from property plant and equipment sales and incentives
proceeds from rebates on purchases of productive assets
supplemental assets acquired under capital leases
noncash or part noncash acquisition fixed assets acquired1
propertyand equipment obtainedin exchangefor financing obligations
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of marketable securities
proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts receivable and other operating assets
increase decrease in accrued liabilities and other operating liabilities
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets
Interest Paid: finance lease interest payment on liability
interest paid on capital and finance lease obligations
interest paid on long term debt
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on sale of investments
other operating activities cash flow statement
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired and payments to acquire nonmarketable securities and other
